name: PickRun (YokiYok)
description:
PickRun (named for its pixels, and a runner game) like dino run, but soon will be better ;)

V1.0 ~ first ever edition [I think 35mb > file size}

V2.0 ~ 2nd Version [40 mb file size] (added save data)

This game will be updated in chunks (v1.0 - v2.0 - v2.5 - ect.) small bug fixes will come out next update

THIS GAME IS IN DEVELOPMENT [atm only for windows 10]
